commands.name: comp_eeprom_ctrl_save_param_sec
commands.comment: Save the parameter inside the EEPROM.

commands.name: comp_eeprom_ctrl_reset_param_sec
commands.comment: Restore default values in RAM. EEPROM content is not changed.

commands.name: comp_eeprom_ctrl_default_param_sec
commands.comment: Restore default values in RAM and EEPROM.

commands.name: comp_fsm_core0_opmode
commands.comment: Select top level FSM operation mode.

commands.name: comp_sensor_reset_delayed_app_start
commands.comment: Perform a device reset and stay the given value [seconds] in the bootloader at next startup.

commands.name: comp_fsm_core0_opmode
commands.comment: Select top level FSM operation mode.

commands.name: comp_sensor_reset
commands.comment: Reset command which starts from BIOS (if available) or bootloader.
